game.name: Demolition Monster Truck Army 2020
game.description:
Many top racers have already reached out to the playground! Where you are guys? Grab your monster truck and be prepared to drive your vehicle like never before in a three-dimensional environment! Does not it sound pretty challenging for you? Join Demolition Monster Truck Army 2020 and get ready to explore the awesome monster truck car crash! Beat your rivals, earn money, and show off the world that nobody can ride trucks like you!

Common boys! Multiple truck models and fabulous environment stunts are waiting for you in this HTML5 racing game! Perform stunts, demolish your rivals trucks, earn cash, and do not forget to buy a new car with advanced wheels and improved Nitro and other more powerful features! You can also use your money to customize your existing vehicles and enter the battle racing battleground with the improved vehicles. Control your vehicle with arrow keys and spacebar to brake in this latest truck game!

When the game finishes, a screen will be shown mentioning the scoreboard in which you can check your player name, kills, death and ping. Try not to collide with other vehicles as every collision causes the loss of energy that you can track on the head of your car! The top left corner of the screen will show you the speed meter, while you can change the camera view or angle by clicking the camera icon shown on the right portion of the screen. Play other addictive and tricky 3D car racing games for free on atmegame.com to add more fun to your boring hours!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D AND ALL AAROWS TO DIRECTION CONTROL, SPACE TO BREAK, C TO CHANGE THE VIEW
